title: Premier ministre Sébastien Lecornu : quelles études a t-il
snippet: Découvrez le parcours scolaire et universitaire de Sébastien Lecornu, nouveau Premier ministre, de son bac ES à son entrée en politique.

title: Sébastien Lecornu, French Minister for the Armed Forces | Ministère des Armées et des Anciens combattants
snippet: Son of a medical secretary and a technician in the aeronautics industry, Sébastien Lecornu studied law at Paris 2 Panthéon-Assas University.

title: Sébastien Lecornu Age, Family, Biography » StarsUnfolded
snippet: He also tried monastic life at the Abbey of Saint-Wandrille. After getting a high school diploma in economics and social sciences at Saint-Adjutor Catholic school in Vernon, France, he earned a bahelor degree in law.

title: Can Macron’s quiet power broker Sébastien Lecornu navigate France’s fractured politics as PM?
snippet: Unlike many French leaders, Lecornu did not come through the so-called "grandes écoles", top professional schools, that have long trained French elites. Educated in private Catholic schools, he studied law before beginning – but never completing ...

title: Sébastien Lecornu - Wikipedia
snippet: Sébastien Lecornu (French: [sebastjɛ̃ ləkɔʁny]; born 11 June 1986) is a French politician who has served as Prime Minister of France since 2025. Positioned on the right of the ideological political spectrum, Lecornu has promoted Gaullist, Séguinist, and socially conservative beliefs.
